verbose_text: In contrast to WDR neurons in neuropathic rats, NS responses to noxious heat stimulation (48degreesC) were not reduced by pregabalin (XREF_FIG; 2-way RM ANOVA, P = 0.184, F 1,7 = 2.172), which again had no effect on the coding properties of sham NS neurons (XREF_FIG; 2-way RM ANOVA, P = 0.486, F 1,6 = 0.475).
evidence: NS responses to noxious heat stimulation (48degreesC) were not reduced by pregabalin
